website_summaries.verdict: A 72-inch beach towel in a fun, hippie style that's usable for variety of purposes besides just the beach.
pros: Handmade cotton towel is also serviceable as a lovely wall tapestry, yoga mat, throw, or bedspread
cons: A few buyers note a chemical smell upon first opening, so wash this towel before use

customer_reviews.title: Although beautiful, I received it with a weird stench scent
customer_reviews.text: Although beautiful, I received it with a weird stench scent. I put it on gentle wash, air dried it, and the stench won't go away. Also, the colors bled on the white tassels. Not happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: NKAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love/Super Cute/Smart Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute! I'm using it as a little mat under my dog's foot bath in my entry. (She's boho-bougie and insisted I give her something cute to look at while she rinses off outdoor allergens.) I washed it because the colors a gorgeous and vibrant but I didn't know if it would stain my floors if it got wet. Washed well without noticeable shrinking, and the fringe did take a very soft pink (but it's kinda cute). A smart buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not exactly like the picture but I still love it. It’s a little thicker then a sheet. It does have a slight smell like others have mentioned but after a day or so I didn’t notice it. I have not washed it yet in fear of it bleeding onto the tassels so I’ll probably handwash it. It’s really pretty, and I think it’s a nice product especially for the price. I would but it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are exactly as pictured! I bought this with the intent to make a Christmas tree skirt for a 12’ tree. It’s going to work perfectly and be unique with little work (just a slit cut to center from one side).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love the dark and bright color contrasts
customer_reviews.text: So so cute! Love the dark and bright color contrasts, fits perfect on my round dinner table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is beautiful! I was skeptical of the colors and it being as shown in the pictures, but it is exactly as shown! This tapestry is large and a great size for the price. The fringed edges help with size and are a beautiful accent. My one and only complaint is that, as soon as I opened the tapestry it smelled of burning plastic. I thought it would go away if I simply laid it out, but it did not. Unfortunately the smell was so strong it has been outside since an hour after it arrived. Im hoping it goes away after its washed.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for myself, gifted the other-Both very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this one to my sister-worked great at the beach to keep the sand off us, and shook out easy. Word of advice, wash it separate from other items until you are sure colors won't run.
customer_reviews.author: P Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach, picnics or outdoor concerts. Folds up nicely and would fit perfectly in a tote or backpack. Colors are vibrant and the fringe is sewn on quite nicely and doesn't look cheap. I love this tapestry! Washes well too on cold setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong dye, great quality overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and great throw. Not too thin nor too thick. I put it over my couch and it looks amazing and protects the couch from kids and pets. Be aware that the dye is VERY STRONG and I had to wash it 6 times to get the excess dye out. If you do not wash the excess dye out, it will stain any cloth it contacts. The colors remain bright after many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Volpe Furbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lounging in the backyard and take to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected! Perfect for lounging in the backyard and take to the beach. Soft material and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Meggies81

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome as a blanket to sit on at a concert ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome as a blanket to sit on at a concert that we had lawn tickets for...the other reviewers were right about the fringe turning pink, but it is still very cute and usable. It was not very soft at first and it did have a funny smell, but I just unwrapped it and hung it up in my bathroom and it was perfect for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Superb!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tapestry! Best quality, beautiful colors and I have ordered quite a few over the year and this is seriously the best ever! I am not being paid for this and I promise you will not be dissatisfied. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lupus_Warrior_Meek

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. . I thought this was a little heavier material than what I got. the colors look good but are already starting to fade a bit with only 2 washes. VERY thin fabric. will probably blow away if you are taking this to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: which is good because I want to use it for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected! A little thicker than your average tapestry, which is good because I want to use it for the beach, picnics, etc. I did wash it in cold water on a delicate cycle when I got it because it smelled like chemicals. The colors bled a little onto the fringe but it's hardly noticeable and I don't mind. Much cheaper than I will find from any store in town. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Very thin fabric, one recommend use was as a throw rug, not a great plan, its as thin as a sheet of notebook paper and because its round it will be hard to hang, but I may try that next... best use maybe be good as a round table cloth... pretty, but did not serve the purpose I needed...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Seibel

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: This is a true Indian dyed product. Pure vegetable dyes. Not colorfast. Cotton, not microfiber. Beautiful. Just exactly what the description said. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any decor!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors and it fits perfectly on my papasan chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t nearly as pretty as in the picture. As others have said, it’s not a beach towel or blanket at all. It’s a dyed sheet. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: book-lover

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful and Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, with vibrant colors and good quality fabric. When i conduct interfaith services i plan to use this on the floor in the center of the circle, with the center table (candle on it) in the middle. Lovely. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Channahsorah

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was just a bit bigger to cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was just a bit bigger to cover more of the top of my daughters play tent, but it arrived on time and as pictured. Will definitely be getting another for the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Had a slight strange smell. But it washed right off. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because everyone was talking about the color and smell. Well my colors are deep and rich no problems there. Yes it’s a small smell but it comes from shipping and being in plastic. I let it air out for one day and the smell was gone. It’s really big and I love it!!! I will be ordering another color
customer_reviews.author: Mcelveen

customer_reviews.title: light weight and beautiful. Funky smell was easy to get rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking to bring with me on a day in the park, light weight and beautiful. Funky smell was easy to get rid of with some spray.
customer_reviews.author: CTLa

customer_reviews.title: It nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the material is a bit rough, however functional for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, great size. It's a perfect thickness. Light in weight but thick enough to be durable for a beach throw. Buying a couple more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many of these. They are inexpensive and make great gifts for anyone! We use ours at the beach and park all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! Colorful! Nicely made!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made! Nice quality! Pretty pattern and fabric. The colors are beautiful too! Nice white fringe trim! Worth the price :) No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It traveled with me through Paris
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item. Ive had it for a year. Although the first wash the pink bled through the white and made the product a bit dull.
customer_reviews.author: annie gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Smells but pretty
customer_reviews.text: It smells terribly, like a chemical, even after 3 washes. It is pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering anothed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and huge. Lots of compliments on this one. It's hanging on my wall in my guest room and it gives the room a slight bohemian flair. Lovely
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Not beachtowel fabric but so pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. The colors are rich and the quality is good however this is NOT a beach towel . The fabric is thin . I do like it, but if you are wanting something absorbent you might keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: jamie proctor

customer_reviews.title: Not a towel ok
customer_reviews.text: Not made really well but ok and lightweight for travel does bleed when you wash it to get the smell out
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Love this big cotton cloth
customer_reviews.text: Love this big cotton cloth. I've washed it and it does pretty good. Faded a little On The Fringe but not bad. Have bought several of these. Love them
customer_reviews.author: MtrcyclMiMi

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and i use it every time I go to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and i use it every time I go to the beach or pools. I get tons of compliments! Even used it as a table cover once, the people loved it ;)
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good blanket for it's price. Color fades quickly if left in sun for prolonged time. Some shrinkage if left in heat for prolonged time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I used this for an outdoor wine festival. It was a good size, beautiful colors. I definitely recommend washing before use as it has a strong odor. It’s super cute and a really good value. Perfect for picnics.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, makes a great table cloth for my round coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C Reece

customer_reviews.title: Smells funny
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but smelled horrible when I got it, I’ve washed several times and can’t get the smell out, not sure how to explain the smell but it’s not good
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have it hanging in my living room. I love it! It was just as described, and couldn't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Wall

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 4 stars because I bought it for a family vacation and my grand child loved it. I gave it to her without hesitation ...
customer_reviews.text: This was thinner than I hoped it would be...probably wont last very long. I gave it 4 stars because I bought it for a family vacation and my grand child loved it. I gave it to her without hesitation and that makes me really really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful. Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. They look beautiful. Just as expected. Made a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's really pretty and the colors are really vibrant
customer_reviews.text: It's really pretty and the colors are really vibrant! It photographs really well too. The material is sort of a cross between a table cloth or cheap bed sheet, but I'm gonna try it out at the park as a blanket to lay on the grass for my daughter. All in all, it's not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hurst

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Colors were darker than what appears in the picture. Fringe had a yellow tint. Fabric has a very strong chemical smell. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. gaffney

customer_reviews.title: The tapestry itself is fine. It's actually the exact same as another one ...
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry itself is fine. It's actually the exact same as another one I ordered, just with a white trim around it, but the trim is added very poorly. It is falling apart and the stitch holding it on is a dark black thread sewn in a very crooked line and it just doesn't look as good as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... received it changed my mind as it is too nice and using as a table cloth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to us at the beach but when I received it changed my mind as it is too nice and using as a table cloth. Made of cotton which is of a good quality. Thinking of buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells terrible. I washed it and the colors turned the ...
customer_reviews.text: very thin material, smells terrible. I washed it and the colors turned the white fringe pink! oh well, I put it in the trunk of my car for a something to sit on if I lay in the grass! it will have to be "dry" grass!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift for my roommate
customer_reviews.text: The colors didn't arrive as expected, but it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: giraffeinahat

customer_reviews.title: but it is beautiful. Thin
customer_reviews.text: vibrant colors, I thought they would be dim, but it is beautiful. Thin material

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is not really good.
customer_reviews.text: The mandala it’s very cute but the fabric doesn’t have a really good quality, it’s very rough. Not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, and just as described. The material was cotton, and the size and colors were exactly as pictured, so I'm very happy with this purchase! I would highly recommend this for anybody wanting a lightweight beach blanket, that's not too thin!
customer_reviews.author: Connie C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Using it as a tablecloth in my living room-- and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks great on my round table. Colors are a little darker but love the fringe & very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cute to take to the beach... bad decision to wash it, not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Maria José Llerena Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Fits perfect I’m beach bag and folds nicely because it’s thin. Also very easy to get sand off of. I’m 5’9’ for reference and I have plenty of room for everything
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: A rainbow full of joy!
customer_reviews.text: Not hudge, but it's the perfect size to chill on at the beach or at a park... Very vibrant...

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It smells SO bad. But it’s plenty big and very colorful. Fabric is decent.

customer_reviews.title: It's super pretty, just wish it was a bit thicker
customer_reviews.text: It's super pretty, just wish it was a bit thicker. I used it on the beach. It takes a while to dry.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for picnics in the park, days at the beach or night around the bonfire.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lightweight beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Great for taking to the park or the beach! Lightweight so it fits easily in a small bag. Beautiful colors too!

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice and is everything it described and also is so so pretty! Love It

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is so nice! It looks great in our living room! The colors are nice and mostly true to the picture. The background purple is darker on the one we received, which actually makes it look even better. Definitely recommend; it will uplift any space you put it in!
customer_reviews.author: Amee Patel

customer_reviews.title: pretty pattern and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Big, vibrant colors, pretty pattern and fast shipping! Good for a beach blanket, or for a picnic!

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful. I can't seem to get enough of mandala ...
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful. I can't seem to get enough of mandala tapestrys. I have them all over the house.I've made duvet covers.and four poster bed curtains

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's good for a few occasions
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, I use it as a table cloth or to throw down at picnics. Though I gave it a three because the fabric is very cheap. I haven't washed it because I know it will ruin the pattern.

customer_reviews.title: bought as gifts
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these as gifts and they were very much loved!!

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait for the beach

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, decently made, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! For the price the quality is much better than you'd expect.

customer_reviews.title: The bad smell just won't go away
customer_reviews.text: I've washed this three times and sat it out in the sun for a few days. It still stinks. Kinda smells like fireworks or something similar.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I love this tapestry! I took it to the beach, festivals, and it was a prop in a video! So pretty!

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Has more purple than red but I still love it. Good size too!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great...except for that it was delivered to me WET/DAMP. Why?

customer_reviews.title: Not a towel.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a towel. Very misleading in the description! It is paper thin material that you can see through and looks like a table cloth. There is no way I would use this at the beach with hot sand. It has a very bad odor.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very stinky so I had to wash it. When I washed it (on delicate) the fringe fell off 😳

customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. I will be returning this item. This is not a towel, it is a piece of fabric with fringe.

customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new round tapestry. Love the bright colors and design.

customer_reviews.text: Beware the dyes in the fabric will come off some wash it and air dry it at least twice before use

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is beautiful! So far we've taken it to the beach and the park and we love it. It's thick enough to protect your clothing from getting damp / dirty but also thin enough to easily fold and throw in your bag without taking up a ton of space. This item is pretty true to color, it does fade a little after washing but still remained vibrant overall. The material is not super soft but it is sturdy and so far so tears at all. Overall a great little throw especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: do nut purchase! ALl the colors ran all over ...
customer_reviews.text: do nut purchase! ALl the colors ran all over me and everything i owned, and detroyed my bathing suit at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but messy
customer_reviews.text: It's a very beautiful tapestry and I received tons of compliments when I use it as a beach blanket! I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 because the colors were not quite the same as the picture and the dye will stain your skin until it gets a couple washes. The greens and lighter colors in the image are not as vibrant, it all has more of a red tint.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful, lightweight, and convenient for many situations and environments. :)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tapestry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the color is nothing like what's in the picture. The picture is so much better otherwise its nice.
customer_reviews.author: pamela wegman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Beautiful colors, just as pictured. Cotton as expected-- about the weight of a tablecloth. A slight ink smell. Tossed it in the wash, will let you know. Update I washed it alone, cold water with some good smelling detergent and line dried it. The smell is gone. The pink did run into the fringe, but luckily it is uniformly pink so it looks fine. The material softened up some in the wash. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Choolie

customer_reviews.title: just like a table cloth
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin, just like a table cloth, but man it stayed cool laying on it on the white sandy beaches in Florida last month.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: This is very pretty but it smells so bad that I cannot use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty but it smells so bad that I cannot use it. I have washed it six times (in a row) and left it in the sun all day, and it still smells too strongly of chemicals for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER CUTE! Ugh love this so much I used it at a concert since we had lawn seats and I didn't want to sit on the grass...it's a good size and looks adorable in pictures The material is thick enough to not get moist on grass or sand but not too thick to be heavy and a hassle to carry very satisfied with this purchase and can't wait to take it to the beach with me!
customer_reviews.author: megann7

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - be sure to wash it
customer_reviews.text: The rug is exactly as pictured! Beautiful, vibrant colors. I used it upon opening the package at the beach and the colors bled a little onto my skin! Moral of this encounter: wash it before you use it to set the dyes! After washing it now I have no more issues AND it's softer. Would definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for throwing something down and sitting at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors! This tapestry is cotton and not very absorbent. After I washed it the colors bled on to the fringe and they are not a purply-pink color. Otherwise, this product was as expected. Perfect for throwing something down and sitting at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: colors pictured are not what you get
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one pictured as purples, blues and greens.It came as more just a messed up shade of red.No blues at all. I have noticed with these , that they seem to be the rejects of the ones pictured. Like the dye job did not come out correctly and they were as a result bought by a company to resale. I believe in truth in advertising. If the picture showed the one i received then I would be fine. However, this gives you the illusion that you will receive a multi-color and bright tapestry. You will not. They are still pretty but not as pretty as the pics. Also, after washing mine, the colors appeared faded.
customer_reviews.author: ARTCARGAL

product_meta.title: colors of rajasthan COR's Hippie Mandala Tapestry Round Roundie Wall Hanging Beach Towel Throw Yoga Mat Round Tapestry 72"
product_meta.description: Size:72 InchesCOR's Beautiful throw/wall hanging tapestry hand made in India. The sheet measures 72 " diameter. As these throws are hand made some designs may vary from the images shown. This reflects their hand made qualities and is in no way to be considered a defect. Brighten up any space with this beautiful wall hanging. Perfect for walls, beds, sofas, and much much more...
feature_bullets: Each bedspread / throw is beautifully screen printed with beautiful patterns colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars328 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
